description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In camera driver, there is a possible use after free due to a logic error. This could lead to local denial of service with System execution privileges needed
En el controlador de la cámara, existe un posible use-after-free debido a un error lógico. Esto podría provocar una denegación de servicio local con privilegios de ejecución del System necesarios.
